issue.title: [C++] Add PrettyPrint function for Schemas, which also outputs any dictionaries
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-1396](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-1396). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
If schemas are dictionary-encoded, then we do not see the categories at present in `Schema::ToString`

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-1396?focusedCommentId=16155199) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
